name: cloudberry
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small orange fruit similar to a blackberry that grows on a bush with white flowers, found in northern areas of the world: We had Swedish waffles covered with cloudberries and cream. Our restaurants serve local arctic specialities, including dishes with reindeer, grouse and cloudberry.
JuhaHuiskonen/E+/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesI've seen this dish prepared with cloudberries, which are orangey. The countryside around the cable car terminus is prime berry-picking territory; the rare cloudberry grows here.The menu consisted of blinis with Finnish fish roe; Finlandia vodka; deer with root vegetables; cloudberry mousse from Lapland.In this Finnish lakeside 19th century house, Leo serves up pancakes with cloudberry compote.
